img_summary: The image depicts the "Wind Tamer," a legendary item in *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is obtained by defeating the secret boss Fuban in the Kingdom of Sahali area of Yellow Wind Ridge, after completing the Boar-Man questline. The item grants significant damage reduction, immunity to strong winds, and massively increases damage reduction for a short duration upon activation.
